DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigate effect yoghurt drink contain two dos plant stanol ester either without added camelina oil serum cholesterol level moderately hypercholesterolemic subject
DOC.brief_title: Lipid-lowering Effect Plant Stanol Ester Yoghurt Drinks
DOC.criteria: BMI < 30 kg/m2 moderate hypercholesterolemia ( fast total cholesterol 58 mmol/l ) serum triglyceride < 3 mmol/l . normal liver , kidney thyroid function subject must voluntarily sign informed consent use cholesterol lower food dietary supplement within 21 day start intervention lipid lower medication history unstable coronary artery disease ( myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass craft ( CABG ) , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) within previous 6 month , diabetes , hyperglycemia , temporal ischemic attack malignant diseases pregnancy lactation alcohol abuse subject intolerance ingredient test product
